snippet: Coach John Tortorella, known for his volatility, was less tempestuous than usual as the Rangers began preparing for the shortened N.H.L. season, but he still made his opinions known.
abstract: New York Rangers coach John Tortorella, known for his volatility, is less tempestuous than usual as the team prepares for a 48-game, 99-day regular season.
lead_paragraph: Coach John Tortorella, known for his volatility, was less tempestuous than usual as the Rangers began preparing for the shortened N.H.L. season, but he still made his opinions known.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Tortorella in Midseason Form at First Practice
headline.main: First Rangers Practice Finds Tortorella in Midseason Form
headline.print_headline: First Rangers Practice Finds Tortorella in Midseason Form
